mapper.select: select visit_a.id id, visit_a.city city, visit_a.region region, visit_a.visa_application_id visaApplicationId from visit_address visit_a where visit_a.visa_application_id = #{va_id}

select ut.id ut_id, ut.visa_application_id ut_visaApplicationId, ut.decision ut_decision, ut.create_dttm ut_createDttm,
va.id va_id, va.applicant_info_id va_applicantInfoId, va.attached_photo va_attachedPhoto, va.visa_info_id va_visaInfoId,
vi.id vi_id, vi.category_type vi_category, vi.entry_type vi_entryType, vi.valid_from vi_validFrom, vi.valid_to vi_validTo,
ai.id ai_id, ai.sex ai_sex, ai.birth_country ai_birthCountry, ai.birth_date ai_birthDate, ai.last_name ai_lastName, ai.first_name ai_firstName, ai.middle_name ai_middleName, ai.citizenship ai_citizenship, ai.contact_info_id ai_contactInfoId, ai.address_id ai_addressId, ai.person_document_id ai_personDocumentId, ai.work_or_study_info_id ai_workOrStudyInfoId,
a.id a_id, a.region a_region, a.city a_city, a.street a_street, a.house a_house, a.section a_section, a.building a_building, a.apartment a_apartment,
ci.id ci_id, ci.email ci_email, ci.phone_number ci_phoneNumber,
pd.id pd_id, pd.doc_no pd_docNo, pd.series_code pd_seriesCode, pd.issue_date pd_issueDate, pd.valid_from pd_validFrom, pd.valid_to pd_validTo, pd.issuer pd_issuer,
wosi.id wosi_id, wosi.organization wosi_organization, wosi.job_title wosi_jobTitle, wosi.contact_info_id wosi_contactInfoId, wosi.address_id wosi_addressId,
wosia.id wosia_id, wosia.region wosia_region, wosia.city wosia_city, wosia.street wosia_street, wosia.house wosia_house, wosia.section wosia_section, wosia.building wosia_building, wosia.apartment wosia_apartment,
wosic.id wosic_id, wosic.email wosic_email, wosic.phone_number wosic_phoneNumber from user_task ut inner join visa_application va on (ut.decision is null and va.id = ut.visa_application_id) inner join visa_info vi on vi.id = va.visa_info_id inner join applicant_info ai on ai.id = va.applicant_info_id inner join address a on a.id = ai.address_id inner join contact_info ci on ci.id = ai.contact_info_id inner join person_document pd on pd.id = ai.person_document_id inner join work_or_study_info wosi on wosi.id = ai.work_or_study_info_id inner join address wosia on wosia.id = wosi.address_id inner join contact_info wosic on wosic.id = wosi.contact_info_id order by ut.create_dttm desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from user_task where decision is null
